answers.answer: I'm a ftm but my baby is measuring 3 weeks ahead due to her length and she's already 3 lbs , I'm 29+2

question: Im 29 weeks measuring 4 weeks further along, amd my baby is measuring even further along in size and weight. I know for A fact my due date is right, and the doctor is expecting A 9-10lb baby. 9 at the very least. I was wondering if anyone else went through this. What happened? Will they induce me? Pla n a csection? I have lots of friends pregnant right now and the ones further along than me are way smaller. Im huge compared to everyone else belly wise. This is my second baby btw. And i have gestational diabetes, had it with my first and she weighed 7.12
title: Big baby!! measuring 4+weeks farther
